name: Blocky Leapers - Super Endless World Jumper
name_original: Blocky Leapers - Super Endless World Jumper
description:
Blocky Leapers is a fun and addictive vertical leaping game with one-touch mechanics.

Goal is simple: Land on each platform without falling, but moving platforms makes it a bit difficult. How high can you leap?

Collect Gems to unlock new characters and worlds. Better yet, have fun playing! Get those thumbs ready!

[Features]
• 30 New Characters to Unlock
• Beautiful Worlds to Explore
• Collect Gems for Prizes
• Beat your Friends and Family's High Score
• More coming soon...

For more latest news and updates on #blockyleapers, follow us here:
